body.name: FOTOSOK 4 Drawer Dresser, White Dresser Modern Storage Chest of Drawers 23.6L x 15.7W x 31.5H in, White Dresser Storage Cabinet with 4 Drawers for Home Office, White
body.stockDetail: Only 6 left in stock - order soon.
features: Modern Dresser Being Different--An unique minimalist style piece. The whole 4 drawer cabinet is in a solid white tone—so chic. Straight lines and classic minimalist structure—so cool for contemporary and future sense home renovation. Who would not try such a fashionable dresser?

Not Only A Stylish Decoration--There’s more to this storage dresser than a charming appearance. Textured white MDF boards bring the whole chic look together, meanwhile fitting for better stability and durability. Please don't forget the optional anti-toppling device to protect your family!

For Added Convenience--With the unique friendly pull-out design of the drawer panel, you will be amazed at how easy it is to pull out these drawers! Designed with organization and convenience in mind, chest of 4 drawers for sorting stuff like toys, files, or books...you determine!

Versatile Nightstand or Storage Cabinet--Suitably sized 23.62”L x 15.75”W x 31.5”H, hallway, living room, office welcome this small dresser. Lamps, glasses, or smile photographs on the top surface, things you need are in hand reach.

Keep It Simple--Thanks to the numbered parts, and easy-to-follow instructions, you'll have this 4 drawer dresser without sacrificing much of your leisure time, and find a practical yet unique way to spice up your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprising Little Cabinet!!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to put my microwave on in the kitchen.Like the drawers to put ziplock bags, dish towels, etc in. Came well packed, in excellent condition, and all parts accounted for. It assembled easily with all parts lining up. The drawers run a bit flimsy on the runners, but are plenty sufficient for light items. Overall, pleased with this cabinet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t work out for me but really good customer service!
reviews.reviewText: I usually don’t write reviews but I had to about this seller. I bought these drawers for my room to put my extra clothes in but they didn’t all fit, so I had to return them but it was really good quality and the return process was so easy. They have such great customer service and respond super quick. Really recommend purchasing products from them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Update..Lots of parts and patience
reviews.reviewText: You have to look on every angle of the part to find the place it is labeled. One of the bags was labeled T and it’s really E because there isn’t even a T. The parts that have the wheels on it are engraved they do not have a sticker on them and you have to have a lot of patience. I’ll let you know later how sturdy it is but so far it’s just taking me very long to read the directions and do everything precisely.Update - I think it took me about 3 hours!!The instructions showed the rollers going past the wood but it’s a 3D effect I had to redo them!! My husband thinks it’s crap furniture and won’t last compared to the nice wood dresser we had but my daughter and I love it- the way it looks next to her bed- we got 2 so she can spread out her clothes and not over load it. I think it will be fine. It may not last as long as wood but I hope it lasts at least 5 -7 years

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for my needs
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my master closet and it works perfectly for my storage needs. It is a little time consuming to assemble but it wasn't hard. Instructions are easy to follow. I did end up adding some rubber stoppers to the drawers so that they close more softly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a nice dresser for looks but it’s been cheap and not sturdy at all I’ve only had it for a few weeks and it’s already broken if you have toddlers I do not recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working perfectly for our purposes…
reviews.reviewText: We are planning to place 5 of these drawer sets in our walk-in closet as an alternative to a traditional dresser, freeing up space in the bedroom. They are easy to assemble with only a screwdriver needed (powered or manual), though it does take some time. Assembly becomes easier and faster with each successive completion. I have completed and placed three so far and they are working well for our purposes. Smooth drawer movement on rollers, sturdy structure, smooth semi-gloss paint finish. I did add some tiny self-adhesive foam pads to the backside of the drawer facade to soften the sound when closing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Totally worth the money. Took about 4 hours to build by myself. Instructions were super easy to follow. Love the outcome!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
